                (static) set_skel_mix_factor(armobj, factor, timeopt)

                Change mix factor used to mix the last two skeletal animations. The non-zero time allows to perform smooth animation transitions.
                Parameters:
                Name Type Attributes Default Description
                armobj Object Armature object ID
                factor Number Target animation mix factor
                time Number <optional>
                		 0 Time interval for changing the mix factor from the current to the target value.
                Source:
                • ext/animation.js, line 548
